name: 柯明賢
objective:
本課程將由淺入深，介紹化學的基本概念與其在環境工程上之應用。再深入介紹化學平衡、化學動力學、酸鹼平衡、氧化還原反應及複合化學與溶解沈澱平衡等原理。以期學生能具備環境化學之各樣基本知識。　　　　
The course will introduce the basic conception of chemistry and apply to the field of environment step by step.  Further, it also introduces each principle that included equilibrate chemistry equation, equilibrate acid-alkaline equation and oxidation-reduction equation etc.
schedule:
Topic1 環境化學簡介　　1 wk
Topic2 化學熱力學　　2.5 wks
Topic3 化學動力學　　2.5 wks
Topic4 酸鹼化學　　2.5 wks
Topic5 氧化還原化學　　2 wks
Topic6 錯合化學　　1.5 wks
Topic7 溶解沉澱平衡　　2 wks
Topic8 空氣污染化學　　2 wks
scorePolicy:
1. 平時成績　　　　30%
2. 期中考試　　　　30%
3. 期末考試　　　　40%
materials:
教科書  ：施英隆著，環境化學，五南圖書出版公司，初版，2000。
參考書籍：1.Thomas G. Spiro and William M. Stigliani, “Chemistry of the Environment”, Prentice-Hall, Inc., 2nd ed..
2.Clair N. Sawyer, Perry L. McCarty and Gene F. Parkin, “Chemistry for Environmental Engineering and Science”, McGraw-Hill, Inc., 5th ed..
3.Colin Baird, “Environmental Chemistry”, W. H. Freeman and Company, 2nd ed..
